attributes.action: Make changes to the northern Ireland vehicle mottestslikeEnglandsvehicle testing
attributes.background:
Do away with government vehicle test centers
Let smaller garages do vehicle testing for road use
Make it like Englands vehicle testing

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could take action on. The rules on MOTs in Northern Ireland are the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Executive.

You could raise this issue with your MLA, who represents you in the Northern Ireland Assembly. You can find your MLA here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
